summary: Removes the Shrine of Talos fron Talos' statue in Whiterun, not the statue itself. Alternatively, puts the shrine inside Heimsk's house.
descriptionHtml:
Inspired by [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/6849896/?]gtantsa[/url]'s "Thalmor Influence" mods.

The main reason why I made this is because I disagreed with removing Talos' statue. The statue itself is not a symbol of religious worship, but of heroic honoring, as such, the Thalmor should have no need to remove it. The shrine, on the other hand, is a symbol of religious worship, and since Balgruuf simpathizes with the Empire (and later joins its side), it's only fair that he'd have it removed (not to mention it'd give Heimskr a real reason to get out and preach at the statue all day).

This file comes in two flavors:
1) Removes the shrine completely;
2) Places the shrine inside Heimskr's house (since he's a priest of Talos, after all) - not sure if it's compatible withÂ [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/245304]TwilightStar[/url]'s [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/21450/?tab=1&navtag=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.nexusmods.com%2Fskyrim%2Fajax%2Fmoddescription%2F%3Fid%3D21450%26preview%3D&pUp=1]A Conspiracy of Faith

[/url]You need only pick one!

In the future, I'm planning to maybe add a script, so that the events of the civil war affect the shrine's placement. But since I really don't know if I'll manage to do it, you can have a shot a this (not that any of you's need my permission actually).

Tell me of any bugs, because Creation Kit doesn't always wanna work properly for me.
author: User_1685555
